methak kalak pawathi kisima rajayak ho kisima janadhipathiwarayek me rate sitina aabadhitha pudgalayan kerehi awadhanaya yomu kara nathayi da janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha aabadhitha pudgalayan kerehi awadhanaya yomu kirima agaya kala yuthu bawa samaja sewa amathi filaks perera mahatha pawasayi.wadihiti dimanawa siyayata siyaya dakwa wadikaramin me rate wadihitiyan diriganwima agaya kala yuthu bawa penwa dena amathiwaraya me rate siti kisima nayakayek melesa me janathawa kerehi awadhanaya yomu kala bawada penwa deyi.siyalu kshethra kerehi awadhanaya yomu kala janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha mewara laba dunne siyalu janathawata sahana labena ayawayak bawada penwa deyi.
